name: Final Boss (itch)
description:
You, the Evil Emperor of this wastelands, are being chased by innumerable Heroes that want to bring peace to this world in chaos. 
You sense that your time as a Supreme Dictator has come to an end, but you are not letting things easy for the Heroes... 

YOU WILL MAKE THEM REMEMBER YOUR NAME! DEFEATING SO MANY HEROES THAT THEY WILL NOT FORGET THE TERROR YOU PUT THEM THROUGH IN YOUR DAYS OF TYRANY!

Feel the Power of being a Final Boss, using powerful magic abilities that will dime dozens of heroes at once! 

-------------------------

This game was developed for the GameRev Jam Online #1
Theme was "You are the villain"

Since i read the theme during the voting period, I forehand thought about the possibility of the player being some kind of finall boss. I really liked the idea, so I went happy when they announced it was the theme that won. Anyway, whatever the theme it would have been, I'm sure it would have been a funny jam.

Developed in GameMaker Studio 1.4.9999

-------------------------

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys: Shift from side
Up - Down: Fly - Descend
Q - Ability 1
W - Ability 2
E - Ultimate Ability
Enter - Start Game
